statements: SELECT * FROM fashion_editorial_content;
SELECT editorial_id, celebrity_name, publish_date, article_title FROM fashion_editorial_content;
SELECT celebrity_name, publish_date FROM fashion_editorial_content WHERE editorial_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM fashion_editorial_content WHERE celebrity_name = 'Kate Middleton';
SELECT * FROM fashion_editorial_content ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fashion_editorial_content WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT article_title, publish_date FROM fashion_editorial_content WHERE celebrity_name = 'Kendall Jenner';
SELECT article_title FROM fashion_editorial_content WHERE publish_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT celebrity_name, publish_date FROM fashion_editorial_content ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fashion_editorial_content WHERE celebrity_name LIKE '%Kardashian%';
SELECT * FROM EditorialContent;
SELECT title, author, publish_date FROM EditorialContent WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, name, occupation FROM Celebrity ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, birthdate, nationality FROM Celebrity WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT title, content, author, publish_date FROM EditorialContent WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EditorialContent WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT id, title, publish_date FROM EditorialContent WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, content, author FROM EditorialContent ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Celebrity WHERE nationality='USA' ORDER BY birthdate;
SELECT id, name, occupation FROM Celebrity WHERE birthdate BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT id, name, occupation FROM Celebrities WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM Celebrities WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, gender FROM Celebrities WHERE occupation = 'Actor' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT content FROM Editorials WHERE date_published = '2022-01-15';
SELECT c.name, e.title FROM Celebrities c JOIN ContentMapping cm ON c.id = cm.celebrity_id JOIN Editorials e ON cm.editorial_id = e.id;
SELECT * FROM Celebrities LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, occupation, age FROM Celebrities WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT e.title, e.author, c.name AS celebrity_name FROM Editorials e JOIN ContentMapping cm ON e.id = cm.editorial_id JOIN Celebrities c ON cm.celebrity_id = c.id;
SELECT * FROM Celebrities WHERE age >= 30 AND occupation IS NOT NULL ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT c.name AS celebrity_name, c.occupation, COUNT(em.editorial_id) AS editorial_count FROM Celebrities c JOIN ContentMapping cm ON c.id = cm.celebrity_id JOIN Editorials em ON cm.editorial_id = em.id GROUP BY c.name, c.occupation ORDER BY editorial_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM celebrities;
SELECT name, age FROM celebrities WHERE profession = 'Actor';
SELECT id, title, author, publish_date FROM articles WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT caption, credit FROM images WHERE url LIKE '%.png';
SELECT tag_name FROM tags ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT name, age, profession FROM celebrities WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT title, publish_date FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe' ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE credit IS NOT NULL AND url LIKE '%.jpg';
SELECT name, profession FROM celebrities WHERE profession = 'Actor' OR profession = 'Singer' ORDER BY name;
SELECT tag_name FROM tags WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 AND tag_name LIKE '%programming%';
SELECT name, age, nationality FROM Celebrities WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM Articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC
SELECT id, category_name FROM Categories WHERE description IS NOT NULL
SELECT title, content FROM Articles WHERE author = 'John Doe'
SELECT tag_name FROM ArticleTags WHERE article_id = 1
SELECT name, age, occupation FROM Celebrities WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM Articles WHERE author = 'John Doe' AND publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT image_url, photographer, caption FROM Images WHERE article_id = 12345 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT category_name, description FROM Categories WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY category_name;
SELECT title, author, publication_date, content FROM Articles JOIN ArticleTags ON Articles.id = ArticleTags.article_id WHERE tag_name = 'Technology';
